entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 40 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
